results.name: Number of 1's in n-th generation of 1-D CA using Rule 30, started with a single 1.
comment: Number of 1's in n-th row of triangle in A070950.

Index entries for sequences related to cellular automata
example: May be arranged into blocks of length 1,1,2,4,8,16,...:
mathematica: Map[Function[Apply[Plus,Flatten[ #1]]], CellularAutomaton[30,{{1},0},100]] (_N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 10 2009)
xref: This sequence, A110240, and A245549 all describe the same sequence of successive states. See also A269160.
A265703 is an essentially identical sequence.
